Metadata.title: Javier Goldschmidt | Senior Full Stack Engineer
Metadata.description: Building digital science platforms and scalable web systems. Currently at El Gato y La Caja.

Hero.title: Javier Goldschmidt
Hero.description: Building scalable systems and responsive digital platforms for the web.
Hero.about1: I'm a developer with <highlight>12 years of experience</highlight> building everything from video games in Unity to complex web platforms. My work sits at the intersection of <highlight>robust engineering</highlight> and <highlight>thoughtful product design</highlight>.
Hero.about2: Currently, I'm a Senior Engineer at <link>El Gato y La Caja</link>, where I've spent the last 9 years building digital infrastructure for a mass-media science platform—from custom SSO systems to analytics dashboards and e-commerce integrations.
Hero.about3: I specialize in <highlight>responsive React frontends</highlight> and <highlight>complex Node/PHP backends</highlight>, with deep roots in game development and native mobile apps.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: If you'd like to discuss a project or just say hi, I'm always open to conversation.

elgato.title: Full Stack Developer
elgato.description: Started as the first technical hire. Built the foundational web stack and established engineering practices that scaled with the company. Now leading development of digital infrastructure for a mass-media science platform. Built SSO systems, analytics tools, and e-commerce integrations serving 50k+ users.

freelance.title: Web & Mobile Developer
freelance.description: Freelance work building Web and Android applications. Shipped multiple projects and learned the foundations of performance optimization and user experience.

university.title: Bachelor's Degree in Digital Technologies
university.company: Universidad de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires

gridx-ecosystem.title: GridX: Deep Tech Ecosystem Platform
gridx-ecosystem.shortDescription: High-performance platform for LatAm's largest Biotech Company Builder.
gridx-ecosystem.fullDescription: The central digital hub for a biotech startup incubator. We needed a platform that could serve complex scientific data to global investors while remaining easy for non-technical staff to update.

impact.0: Architected a scalable Internationalization (i18n) system serving content in English, Spanish, and Portuguese with low latency
impact.1: WordPress-controlled frontend & form builder where admins can route submissions to specific Airtable bases or Emails based on logic
impact.2: Implemented high-performance video optimization for AI-generated assets, ensuring fast Time-to-Interactive (TTI)
impact.3: Built a dynamic portfolio system managing data for 90+ startups with real-time filtering

gridx-ecosystem.company: El Gato y La Caja / GridX

bancantes-platform.title: Bancantes: Membership & Fintech Engine
bancantes-platform.shortDescription: Custom membership platform with an automated 'Inflation Shield' and 3D gamification.
bancantes-platform.fullDescription: A bespoke membership ecosystem serving 1,500+ monthly subscribers. Unlike standard SaaS tools, this platform was engineered to handle the specific economic volatility of the region while keeping users engaged through gamification.

impact.0: Engineered a unique 'Inflation Adjustment Engine': An opt-in Cron system that fetches Consumer Price Index (IPC) data via API and automatically updates subscription values quarterly
impact.1: Developed a unified Payment Orchestration Layer triggering transactions via MercadoPago, PayPal, and CBU (Bank Debit) APIs
impact.2: Built a WebGL '3D Avatar Creator' (Three.js) allowing users to design, download, and share branded digital assets
impact.3: Managed the migration and stability of 1,500+ active recurring subscribers

el-gato-migration.title: Headless Architecture Migration
el-gato-migration.shortDescription: Orchestrating the transition of a mass-media platform to Serverless Next.js.
el-gato-migration.fullDescription: Architected the complete migration of El Gato y La Caja from a monolithic WordPress VPS to a decoupled Headless architecture. The goal was to maintain the editorial flexibility of WordPress while achieving the performance and security of a static frontend.

impact.0: Migrated 6 years of content to Next.js (App Router) with Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR)
impact.1: Developed 'Smart Revalidation': A custom WP plugin that triggers precise cache purges, reducing processing costs
impact.2: Developed custom Gutenberg blocks that render identical React components in both the Admin and Frontend
impact.3: Reduced hosting costs by offloading media to S3 Buckets via custom-made plugin

extras-middleware.title: E-commerce Middleware
extras-middleware.shortDescription: Extending Tiendanube with custom inventory logic, programmatic asset generation and better analytics.
extras-middleware.fullDescription: A backend service built to patch the limitations of Tiendanube e-commerce platform. It acts as a bridge between the storefront, the warehouse, and the user.

impact.0: Engineered 'Virtual Bundling' logic to sync stock across compound products in real-time
impact.1: Built a programmatic Gift Card system that generates unique codes and renders printable high-res PNGs on the fly
impact.2: Extended products with 'Pre-sale' functionality to allow users to purchase products before they are available
impact.3: Extended the Tiendanube Admin Panel UI using Nexo SDK for seamless staff operations
impact.4: Automated the delivery of digital goods
impact.5: Built a micro-frontend that embeds real-time Tiendanube products directly inside editorial content to convert free readers into buyers without interrupting their reading experience.
impact.6: Made a permission-based Dashboard using Looker Studio so staff and authors could visualize sales data and inventory levels

scrollytelling-suite.title: Interactive Data Journalism
scrollytelling-suite.shortDescription: Suite of high-impact storytelling platforms for complex social datasets.
scrollytelling-suite.fullDescription: Lead engineer for multiple data journalism projects. Specialized in transforming dense datasets (gender gaps, poverty metrics, disability rights) into emotional, accessible web experiences.

impact.0: Futuro Programado: Visualize the gender gap in tech with custom SVG animations
impact.1: Parece Elemental: Optimización de scrollytelling con medios pesados para dispositivos de gama baja en áreas con conectividad limitada
impact.2: CLACAI: Built a WCAG 2.1 AA compliant platform specifically for screen readers and keyboard navigation
impact.3: Eureka 3D Reading Experience: A physics-based interactive book for children running in the browser

scrollytelling-suite.company: El Gato y La Caja / Various Clients

cybershock-game.title: Cybershock: Future Parkour
cybershock-game.fullDescription: A high-octane 3D runner built in Unity. I was solely responsible for the engineering of core physics, gameplay loops, and UI systems.

impact.0: Shipped a commercial title, managing the full release lifecycle
impact.1: Engineered a custom physics-based character controller
impact.2: Implemented aggressive object pooling for performance
impact.3: 3000+ downloads and overwhelmingly positive feedback on Steam
